channel.title: Jay Chou on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Jay Chou on 0x000216

item.title: Exclusive Global Jay Chou content available on Spotify from December 16th to 18th
item.description: Source: Spotify website. Music streaming platform, Spotify, released Asian pop star Jay Chou’s latest single, “What Kind of Man are You?” today. Spotify is offering fans an early preview of one of the year’s most anticipated albums, with the release of Jay Chou’s latest album, “Aiyo, Not Bad,” planned for December 26th, days before its official release. Recently ranked the most streamed Asian artist on Spotify’s Year in Music charts, Jay Chou is celebrating his return to the pop charts with this new album after a two-year hiatus.
